name: Kelly's Rescue
overview: Kelly's rescue This is part-1 of what has to become a series of 5 adventures, all with the ultimate aim to rescue Kelly. Kelly is the girl you're in love with and who also works in the national Spy center, just like you do.. You are working as a hail-attendant, the adventure begins in your office, and you are looking forward to the evening when you have a date with Kelly. Special commands in this game are save and restore Ps: this adventure has first written on the Commodore 64 in 1986 this version is more or less a straight port to the Amiga and it won't contain host of the advanced features of the Amiga but he hope you will like it anyway, part 2 is being written on the Amiga and will have an advanced parser and many other features. Happy adventuring, press any key……..
